content: **updated january 23 2025 ** there was an error in line 18 of the main pattern the middle of the diamond it has now been updated in the pdf thank you kmdanley /people/kmdanley for pointing this out **updated august 25 2024 ** there was an error in line 14 of the main pattern the middle of the diamond it has now been updated in the pdf thank you jgore /people/jgore for pointing this out a scarf that channels the taylor swift cardigan make it for any era you want you need two different colors of yarn - one for the main part of the scarf the cables and one for the stripes i used loops & threads impeccable for the main scarf 1 5 skeins and the stripes less than 1 skein for a 72 5 scarf level beginner-friendly necessary skills cast on knit purl slk slip knit-wise cable cast off other notions * size 9 needle * cable needle * tapestry needle * stitch markers i recommend using one between each type of stitch/cable which i distinguished with different font colors * scissors i repeated the main cable part 13 times but you can repeat it as many times as you want
